name: washing_setCourse
description: This function is used to set a specific washing course on a washing machine.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the washing course.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode to set for the washing course.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to set the washing course.
